name: POSTWORLD
description: Cyborgize your character and take over the wasteland!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later (64-bit) Processor: Dual-core Intel 2.4 Ghz or similar Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX 2GB VRAM or similar Storage: 35 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later (64-bit) Processor: Quad-core Intel 2.4 Ghz or similar Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB VRAM or similar Storage: 35 GB available space
